summary: The “gpt-image-1” model will initially be available via OpenAI’s Images API, and the company says support for the Responses API is “coming soon.” OpenAI says that it’s also “continuing to work with developers and businesses to uncover more ways image generation in the API can serve their use cases,” including with Canva, GoDaddy, and Instacart. Figma is leveraging the latest model to bring advanced image generation and editing capabilities across its platform.
